Package org.hibernate.boot.model.internal

Class BasicValueBinder

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.boot.model.internal.BasicValueBinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
JdbcTypeIndicators
public class BasicValueBinder extends Object implements JdbcTypeIndicators
A stateful binder responsible for creating instances of BasicValue.

    • resolveJdbcTypeCode

      public int resolveJdbcTypeCode(int jdbcTypeCode)
      Description copied from interface: JdbcTypeIndicators
      Resolves the given type code to a possibly different type code, based on context.

      A database might not support a certain type code in certain scenarios like within a UDT and has to resolve to a different type code in such a scenario.

      Specified by:
      resolveJdbcTypeCode in interface JdbcTypeIndicators
      Parameters:
      jdbcTypeCode - a type code from SqlTypes
      Returns:
      The jdbc type code to use
